originalText.text: This is the worst Target in the city. They never have anything. Itâ€™s like they only get 2 pieces of each item and thereâ€™s always police there so idk how much is really theft. I bought a sugar and it was hard like it was sitting in heat in the stock room but the expiration was some time in 2025. I thought the area would be convenient but theyâ€™re just wasting space tbh and then when they do get things, it comes in abundance but the next rows/aisles are empty. Iâ€™m just hoping that it gets better in the future. Iâ€™ve gone to the latest target which is on 14th street and that Target is stacked with state of the art self checking meanwhile the one in the heights , are always malfunctioning or out of service.

originalText.text:
Overall good experience here. I feel that management has left them understaffed during the busier times of day.
Not this specific store but all Targets in NYC, they have really become overzealous putting locks on specific items and would rather make a second stop at a grocery store than wait for some one to open the ice cream freezer.

originalText.text: Store is good. The staff is helpful . And friendly . The reason for the low rating  is for the pharmacy. They do not do their job . Not friendly and refuse my insurance . My insurance is at their CVS they charge me full price and tell me to call or dispute the difference. I went to another CVS and had no problems . And the cVs always calls my insurance and covers my medicinie . Do not go to the pharmacy unprofesional . The regular store is amazing  .

originalText.text: So far so good as the saying goes. this store just opened few weeks ago we definitely needed this in the neighboring to bring some brightness after the pandemic so many stores around closed. I know for sure at least people will have the excuse to come here often to do their shopping now. the space is decent it is not like other Target just keep that in mind when heading here is more compact is that makes sense to you. Welcome Target to our multicultural Washington Heights neighborhood ðŸ¥°

originalText.text: I want to give a shout out to all the employees here. Each time I've come here those working at this location have always been very kind and helpful. Especially during the holiday season this target gets really hectic, but the employees are always happy to help and from my experience, always very gracious. I must say it's not like this at every target in New York. So this continues to be my go-to Target in the city.
